      • obtainPassword

        public java.lang.String obtainPassword(java.lang.String id,
                              int size,
                              boolean caps,
                              boolean number,
                              boolean symbols)
        This function is used to retrieve a password from the credential store. If the password doesn't exist, one will be generated based on the provided parameters
        Parameters:
        id - Password id.
        size - password size.
        caps - Flag indicating if capital letters are required in the password.
        number - Flag indicating if numbers are required in the password.
        symbols - Flag indicating if symbos are required in the password.
        Returns:
        Password
